speech: Tell me something you DO NOT WANT 😡 to have in your restaurant today. 👉You can be as detailed as you like. For example, " I do not enjoy pizza.."
Is there any restaurant experiences that you DO NOT WANT 😡to have today? 👉You can be as detailed as you like. For example, " I do not enjoy eating burgers."
Please tell me what you DISLIKE😡 about a restaurant. 👉You can be as detailed as you like. For example, " I don't like a touristy restaurant. The tourist crowd spoils my mood."

messages.title: 🆘Any Examples On What I Should Write?

speech: Tell me something you DO NOT WANT to have in your restaurant today. You can be as detailed as you like. For example, " I do not enjoy pizza.."
Is there any restaurant experiences that you DO NOT WANT to have today? You can be as detailed as you like. For example, " I do not enjoy eating burgers."
Please tell me what you DISLIKE about a restaurant. You can be as detailed as you like. For example, " I don't like a touristy restaurant. The tourist crowd spoils my mood."
